fr.lip6.jkernelmachines.evaluation

Class ApEvaluator<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.lip6.jkernelmachines.evaluation.ApEvaluator<T>
  • Type Parameters:
    T - datatype of input space
    All Implemented Interfaces:
    Evaluator<T>, java.io.Serializable

    public class ApEvaluator<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable, Evaluator<T>

    Simple evaluation class for computing the mean average precision, VOC style.

    Does training, evaluation and timing statistics.

    Author:
    picard
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
